### Practice

```{r load-packages, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Load in the data

```{r}
bender = read_csv("data/benderData.csv")
```

Take a look at the data

```{r look-at-data}
glimpse(bender)
```

Which nation was quickest to fill out the survey? Did this trend continue? Make a visualization to support your claim.
```{r plot-1}
bender %>%
  arrange(by = as.Date(time))
```
